tool_description: To embed (add) a logo to an existing image for example a QR Code
name: QR Code Logo Generator
title: QR Code Logo Generator

api_list.name: QR Code Logo Embed
api_list.description:
AI to add a logo to an existing QR Code. This logo can be placed in any location and of varying size or transparency.

**QR Logo Features**

- Add Logo
- Custom custom sized Logo
- Custom Location Logo
- Apply to any image
- Add multiple Logo's
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-logo-generator.p.rapidapi.com/qrlogoapi.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-logo-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-logo-generator.p.rapidapi.com/qrlogoapi.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-logo-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
